EmailTemplate.name: MHP-EmailTemplate_Telephone_WorkGroups
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello,

The User $name Telephone number is pending.Please fill the telephone number from below link and submit.

MHP Team
EmailTemplate.Subject: Telephone number fill work item generated for User $name
